titles.title: Lord, My God, You Are My Strength

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, my God, You are my strength,
And my comfort in the night time.
I will not fear when adversity
Overtakes me in a moment.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My rock and my refuge are only You.
You order my footsteps with Your light.
May we consecrate our lives to walk
In obedience to Your will.
So that we may love You more,
And may follow You unto the end.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Señor tu eres mi fortaleza
Me consuelas en la noche
No temeré cuando la adversidad
Sobrevenga a mi vida.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Mi roca y mi refugio eres tu
Tu guiarás mis pasos con tu luz
Que podamos consagrar nuestras vidas
Y caminar en tu voluntad Señor
Para así poderte amar y
Seguirte hasta el final.
